channel.title: Work on Of Machines and Men
channel.description: Recent content in Work on Of Machines and Men

item.title: Somerset Art Group Photography Exhibition at YEAST Scrap Store
item.description: Yesterday, there was a photo exhibition by the Somerset Art Group. It is a group started by colleagues and good friends from Seetec-Pluss, and I was invited to help out and exhibit there. The above photos are a collage of my work that was exhibited.

item.title: Work Experience
item.description: Today, I’m starting a work experience placement with the British Civil Service. This page is a temporary demo scratchpad to show off some ideas.
